summary.span: 能夠接收來自工作流程中 Web 服務的資料。

span.span: Enables receiving data from a Web service in a workflow.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 在包含的工作流程部署為 Web 服務時， 會對應至 Web 服務方法。The corresponds to a Web service method when the containing workflow is deployed as a Web service. 在呼叫工作流程 Web 服務時， 會接收資料。When the workflow Web service is called, the receives data.

member this.IsActivating : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出接收的資料是否應啟動工作流程。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether receiving data should start the workflow.

value.span: 如果接收的資料應啟動工作流程，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if receiving data should start the workflow; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有工作流程中的第一個接收可以讓 屬性設定為 `true`。Only the first receive in a workflow can have the property set to `true`. 如果有多個 設定為 `true`，工作階段將會鎖定於第一個要求。If more than one is set to `true`, the session is locked on the first request. 只要其他接收封鎖工作流程，這個情況就會延續，且該工作階段將會鎖死。This lasts as long as the other receive blocks the workflow; the session is deadlocked.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IsActivatingProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 表示目標為 屬性的 。

span.span: Represents the that targets the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性只應在第一次 `true` 時設定為 。The property should be set to `true` for only the very first . 這個屬性設定會向工作流程執行階段發出訊號，表示從用戶端叫用這個 Web 服務方法啟動了工作流程的執行。This signals to the workflow runtime that invoking this Web service method from a client starts the execution of the workflow. 工作流程定義中公開為 Web 服務的第一個活動屬於 型別，而且會將這個屬性設定為 `true`。The first activity of a workflow definition that is exposed as a Web service is of type and sets this property to `true`. [!INCLUDE[DependencyPropertyRemark](~/includes/dependencypropertyremark-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ParameterBindings As WorkflowParameterBindingCollection

summary.span: 取得與輸入參數相關聯的繫結集合，這些參數會輸入至在 屬性中指定的方法。

span.span: Gets the collection of bindings associated with the input parameters to the method specified in the property.

value.span: 屬性集合，做為 屬性所指定之方法上的傳入參數。

span.span: The collection of properties used as inbound parameters on the method specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上的 用來將傳入參數繫結至工作流程中的位置。 on a are used to bind the inbound parameters to locations in the workflow. 在 執行時，範圍位置將設定為所對應傳入參數的值。When the executes, the bound locations are set to the values of the corresponding inbound parameters.

summary.span: 取得或設定有效的角色集合，可將資料傳送至 。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of roles that are valid to send data to the .

value.span: ，包含可將資料傳送至 的有效 Web 服務角色。

span.span: The that contains the Web service roles that are valid to send data to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Web 服務從 集合的非成員收到要求，則會擲回安全性存取例外狀況Security access exceptions are thrown if the Web service receives a request from a non-member of the collection. 預設值是空集合，會提供對 Web 服務的開放存取。The default value is an empty collection, which gives open access to the Web service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly RolesProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 支援的角色有兩種，分別是 Active Directory 和 ASP.NET。

span.span: The two types of supported roles are Active Directory and ASP.NET.
